hero.description: Specialized in frontend, focused on offering high quality solutions that improve the user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been deeply involved in the web ecosystem for nearly two years, focusing on frontend development. I'm passionate about creating outstanding user interfaces, always eager to learn, and staying up to date with the latest web technologies.

experienceItem-1.item-3: Implemented MaterialUI as a design system.
